content: there are so many reasons to love the bobble pocket prayer square pattern this hand-held prayer square gives you something to hold while praying and the cross itself is a beautiful texture that is soothing to hold make a bunch and toss one in your purse car and keep at your bedside table you can make these with all of that scrap yarn you ve been holding onto they are fast to make and you can whip up a square in about 15-minutes which is great when you re looking for a break from prayer shawls and other longer projects these are also perfect for little kids learning to pray too as they re just their size and pretty indestructible this pattern is also available for free on my blog the premium pdf also includes a tutorial for the double_crochet bobble stitches and a chart for bobble stitch placement these prayer squares use mainly single_crochet stitches with bobble stitches to make the textured cross the border is made from the reverse single_crochet aka crab stitch to add a finishing touch dimensions approximately 2 75 x 3 7 cm x 8 cm materials needed size 4 worsted weight yarn such as caron simply soft -
